query:
SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.numero 
FROM lojas l 
JOIN gestores_lojas gl ON l.id = gl.lojaId 
JOIN users u ON gl.gestorId = u.id 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Mónica%' OR u.name LIKE '%Monica%'
ORDER BY l.nome
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT l.id, l.nome, l.numero

JOIN gestores_lojas gl ON l.id = gl.lojaId 
JOIN users u ON gl.gestorId = u.id 
WHERE u.name LIKE '%Mónica%' OR u.name LIKE '%Monica%'
